info.name: The Warrior’s Codex New Combat Rules
info.author: Fungal Brews

description.p: While you are wielding a versatile weapon and no other weapons or shields, you can add your Dexterity modifier (maximum of +1 while one-handed, maximum of +2 while two-handed) to your attack rolls with that weapon.
